resources.string: One hour and one minute ago
Loading failed, please check your network connection
"Are you sure you want to clear records? The Cloud Manager will be removed synchronically after clearing."
Have not deleted contacts data in the last 60 days
Clearing failed due to server failure
The logon info has expired, please try again
The logon info has expired or the account has been changed, please try again
Network unavailable, please check your network
Synchronizing too many times, please try again after 30 seconds
This contact will be separated into multiple contacts.
Choose the contact that you want to join with %s:
"You can't delete contacts from read-only accounts, but you can hide them in your contacts lists."
This contact contains information from multiple accounts. Information from read-only accounts will be hidden in your contacts lists, not deleted.
Deleting this contact will delete information from multiple accounts.
Contact widget added to Home screen.
No pictures are available on the phone.
To create groups you need an account.
To add some, edit the group.
Save and automatically hide this contact.
All your call records will be deleted.
"You'll clear the frequently contacted list in the People and Phone apps and force email apps to learn your addressing preferences from scratch."
"You don't have any contacts to display. (If you've just added an account, it can take a few minutes to sync contacts.)"
"You don't have any contacts to display."

"You don't have any contacts to display.
To add contacts, touch "Menu", then touch:
"
"Accounts to add or set up an account with contacts you can sync to the phone "" "
"New contact to create a new contact from scratch "" "
"Import/Export to import contacts from your SIM or SD card "

"You don't have any contacts to display. (If you've just added an account, it can take a few minutes to sync contacts.)
To add contacts, touch "Menu", then touch:
"
"Accounts to add or set up an account with contacts you can sync to the phone "" "
"Display options to change which contacts are visible "" "
"New contact to create a new contact from scratch "" "
"Import/Export to import contacts from your SIM or SD card "

"You don't have any contacts to display.

"Import/Export to import contacts from your SD card "

"You don't have any contacts to display. (If you've just added an account, it can take a few minutes to sync contacts.)
To add contacts, touch "Menu", then touch:

"Accounts to add or set up an account with contacts you can sync to the phone "" "
"Display options to change which contacts are visible "" "
"New contact to create a new contact from scratch "" "
"Import/Export to import contacts from your SD card "

"You don't have any favourites.
To add a contact to your list of favourites:
"
Touch the Contacts" tab "" "
"Touch the contact that you want to add to your favourites "" "
"Touch the star next to the contact's name "
"Couldn't read details for the requested call."
Searching for vCard data on SD card
Not enough memory. The file may be too large.
"Couldn't parse vCard for an unexpected reason."
No vCard file found on the SD card.
"Couldn't collect meta information of given vCard file(s)."
"One or more files couldn't be imported (%s)."
Caching vCard(s) to local temporary storage. The actual import will start soon.
The file will be imported shortly.
vCard import request was rejected. Try again later.
vCard export request was rejected. Try again later.
Your contact list will be exported to file: %s.
Too many vCard files are on the SD card.
Your contact data is being exported to: %s.
There are no exportable contacts. If you do have contacts on your phone, some data providers may not allow the contacts to be exported from the phone.
No app was found to handle this action.
Removing \"%s\" from sync will also remove any ungrouped contacts from sync.
No additional information for this contact.
Contact list is being updated to reflect the change of language.

"Contacts are in the process of being upgraded.
The upgrade process requires approximately %s MB of internal storage.
Choose one of the following options:"
Join the current contact with the selected contact?
"Switch to editing the selected contact? Information that you've entered so far will be copied."
Delete the group \"%1$s\"? (Contacts themselves will not be deleted.)
Type contact name before joining with another.
"Can't connect to voicemail server. New voicemails are waiting."

"People works better with a Google Account.
• Access from any web browser. • Back up your contacts securely."
Keep your contacts safe even if you lose your phone: synchronise with an online service.
"Your new contact won't be backed up. Add an account that backs up contacts online?"
Your new contact will be synchronised with %1$s.
You can synchronise your new contact with one of the following accounts. Which do you want to use?
To set up voicemail, go to Menu > Settings.
To call voicemail, first turn off Aeroplane mode.
Unable to send sms or mms to the entered number
No shortcut call ready, set up now?
Shortcut call is set up successfully.
Long press the numeric keys on the dialing keyboard to quickly call the corresponding contact
The system will delete all of your call logs with the number
Name and number cannot be empty.
Are you sure to star the selected contacts?
Are you sure to delete selected contacts?
Are you sure to import the selected contacts?
Are you sure to export the selected contacts?
Do you want to export the call logs and sms of this contact to your privacy space? The records will be removed from system after exported successfully.
Setting failed due to full internal storage
Setting failed due to empty contact number
Please input the password for privacy space:
SIM card is invalid, please insert one
SIM card is invalid, please insert one
Choose storage location when creating a new contact
Are you sure to add the selected contacts?
Group members failed to be added.
Please input a correct Email address
Please input a correct Website address
SIM card contacts do not support Email.
Exporting contacts to SIM card failed.
Do not support google location base service
Are you sure to generate a vcard file for the selected contacts?
The selected contacts have been generated to a vcard file
Are you sure to send the selected contacts to Agenda?
Please input a valid group name
"No Full duplicate contacts Click the button to merge partial duplicate contacts"
Are you sure to merge contacts?
The phone will select those duplicate contacts with the same name for mergence. Do not perform other operations during the period. After merging, duplicate contacts will be deleted.
View by type of call logs
You have inserted a new SIM card
Detected a new SIM card, touch to import the contact(s) from the card.
Detected a new SIM card, sure to import the contact(s) from the card?
Dial or use a phonetic search
Contacts do not support the type of file
The group will be deleted, but this will not delete those group contacts from your phone. Continue?
This will not delete those group contacts from your phone.
Voicemail not set up, set it up now?
Unable to save contacts because they have been deleted.
"Show contacts according to the contact frequency "
Unable to export contacts due to insufficient internal storage.
The following contacts %d can be a key merge
The following need to manually merge contacts
Batch import might duplicate contacts, click to merge.
The changes will invalidate after rebooting
nubia music app was not found, changing ringtone failed
Your contact list will be exported to the following file: %s, and the file is located under the root directory of your phone.
Click this button to select the communication card for this contact
Recent calls: %s, Click to call back
Click to return to previous screen
Unable to save contacts due to insufficient internal storage
"Card contacts don't support saving this information"
Tap image to see all numbers or press and hold to reorder
No installed activity available to handle selected action.
You have disabled a required permission.
Please select the operation to execute
Exporting name and number only may cause data loss, continue?
Changing storage location may cause some data loss, are you sure to change it?
